mapper.select: SELECT my_routine_list_code, routine_code, routine_name, routine_type_b, routine_type_a, routine_type_c, routine_type_d, insert_time, insert_user, update_time, update_user FROM my_workout_routine_list WHERE user_code = #{userCode}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO my_workout_routine_list( my_routine_list_code, user_code, routine_code, routine_name, routine_type_a, routine_type_b, routine_type_c, routine_type_d, insert_time, insert_user ) values( get_random_uuid(), #{userCode}, get_random_uuid(), #{routineName}, #{routineTypeA}, #{routineTypeB}, #{routineTypeC}, #{routineTypeD}, now(), #{insertUser} )

INSERT INTO daily_record_m( daily_record_master_code, user_code, my_routine_list_code, routine_type_a, routine_seq, routine_record_date )VALUES( get_random_uuid(), #{userCode}, #{myRoutineListCode}, #{routineTypeA}, (SELECT count(*) FROM daily_record_m WHERE routine_record_date = #{routineRecordDate}), #{routineRecordDate} )
mapper.select: SELECT M.*, my.routine_name FROM daily_record_m M LEFT JOIN my_workout_routine_list MY ON M.my_routine_list_code = MY.my_routine_list_code WHERE M.user_code = #{userCode} AND M.routine_record_date = #{routineRecordDate} ORDER BY m.routine_seq
mapper.update: update daily_record_m up set routine_seq = sel.row_num from ( select row_number() over(order by M.routine_seq) as row_num, M.routine_record_date, M.daily_record_master_code from daily_record_m M where M.routine_record_date = #{routineRecordDate} ) sel where up.daily_record_master_code = sel.daily_record_master_code
mapper.select: select routine_record_date , right(routine_record_date,2) as attendanceDate from daily_record_m where user_code = #{userCode} and left(routine_record_date,7) = #{calendarMonth} group by routine_record_date order by routine_record_date

INSERT INTO daily_record_d( daily_record_detail_code, daily_record_master_code, user_code, my_routine_list_code, workout_routine_seq, workout_iterations_count, workout_set_weight, workout_done_yn )VALUES( get_random_uuid(), #{dailyRecordMasterCode}, #{userCode}, #{myRoutineListCode}, (SELECT count(*) FROM daily_record_d WHERE daily_record_master_code = #{dailyRecordMasterCode}), #{workoutIterationsCount}, #{workoutSetWeight}, #{workoutDoneYn} )
SELECT daily_record_detail_code FROM daily_record_d WHERE daily_record_master_code = #{dailyRecordMasterCode} ORDER BY workout_routine_seq DESC limit 1
mapper.update: update daily_record_d up set workout_routine_seq = sel.row_num from ( select row_number() over(order by D.workout_routine_seq) as row_num, D.daily_record_detail_code, D.daily_record_master_code from daily_record_d D where D.daily_record_master_code = #{dailyRecordMasterCode} ) sel where up.daily_record_detail_code = sel.daily_record_detail_code
